answers.answer: I would think if you have one auto immune disease u are likley to have another, I dont think one causes the other but its actually your body attacking...."itself". The result is sorting through the progress of the..."attacks". ..to what degree and how advanced.I was told by and endo dr that the adrenals are the last to go...
